content.text: Let me find where these "Browse" and "Display all" labels are used.

I can see the pattern - "Browse" opens browser modals for individual items, while "Display all" shows all items in a category. The user wants all of these to say "Display all" on this page. Let me read the relevant section of ContextTab.tsx.

I see the pattern. `FileRow` components use "Browse" while `ItemRow` components use "Display all". The user wants all of them to say "Display all". Let me change all the "Browse" labels to "Display all".
